channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin rebounds after a rosy inflation report—But there are storm clouds on the horizon
item.description: Inflation hit 2.8% in February, adding 0.2% instead of the 0.3% economists expected.

item.title: Spotify says it paid $10 billion in royalties in 2024
Burnout is costing companies as much as $5 million a year—Here’s how that breaks down from average worker to top executive
item.description: Losses can range from $4,000 to over $20,000 per employee.

item.title: Inflation cooled in February, but economists say Trump’s tariffs haven’t had time to take effect
item.description: Consumer prices rose 2.8% from a year earlier, data revealed. It’s a deceleration from January, but doesn’t appear to be enough to warrant an immediat...

item.title: Roomba vacuum maker iRobot’s stock plummets on warning it might go bust
Egg prices fall, Trump administration says, but perhaps only for a little while
item.description: Agriculture Secretary says prices have dropped by nearly $2 per dozen.

item.title: Why this new Viking Therapeutics contract is a weight-loss-drug game changer
‘A parade of horribles’: Airline stocks confront turbulence at outset of 2025
Eggs aren’t getting any cheaper. Prices were up a further 10% in February.
Binance nets biggest ever crypto investment as UAE-backed MGX puts in $2 billion
item.description: The investment came in the form of stablecoins and reflects the growing presence of crypto in the Middle East.
